name: Tap Shot
shortText: Tap Shot is a single button arcade shooter combined with a modern mobile-friendly design.

name: Robo Repair
shortText: Robo Repair is an action platformer where a robot who crash landed into an alien factory must track down the missing part needed to repair his companion.

name: Grave Guardian
shortText: Grave guardian is a stealth adventure game about a pacifist ghost on a mission to confront the evil necromancer without resorting to violence.

name: Holo Defender
shortText: Holo Defender is an arcade tower defense where you strategically purchase towers to stop the hoard of menacing robots.

name: Burst Fighters
shortText: Burst Fighters is a physics-based RPG where you collect powerful coin warriors to help you on an epic fantasy adventure.

name: Cake Walk
shortText: Cake Walk is an puzzle platformer about Vanilla the Time Witch on a quest to recover her stolen cake from the evil Demon Lord.

name: Rogue Bot
shortText: Rogue Bot is a roguelike shoot-em-up about a rogue robot exploring a dangerous planet and take down enemies using an assortment of weapons.
